item.description:
Testing the waters to see if more people would like to meet on a weekend day. I'll be there just looking to meet some more people and hang out for a bit.

If only one or two people can make it to the event. I'll most likely cancel it. I know some people have family/friend weekend commitments but a couple of people mentioned only being able to attend something on the weekend so I'm testing the availability of this.

We'll still continue with the weekday meetups.

For more information, see http://www.pandemoniu...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: United Dungeons & Dragons July Meetup Day
